description: MaaS common geolocaion units that are used consistently within our own objects

latitude.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

longitude.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

relaxedLatitude.description: No-numeric precision version of MaaS core latitude

relaxedLongitude.description: No-numeric precision version of MaaS core longitude

location.description: Geographic latitude-longitude object in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

relaxedLocation.description: No-numeric precision version of MaaS core location

shortLocation.description: Geographic latitude-longitude number-pair array in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

shortLocationString.description: Geographic latitude-longitude number-pair as a string in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System
